short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Detects which Payment Service Provider (PSP) is used on the webpage and displays its logo.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Curious about which Payment Service Provider (PSP) is used on a webpage? PSP Detector helps you identify the payment gateway powering any site you visit. The extension displays the PSP’s logo, offers a brief description, and provides a link to its official website for more information.

• Quick Identification: Easily see which payment service provider is used on any site without needing to dig through code.
• Wide Coverage: Supports 50+ global PSPs and payment orchestrators, making it easier to learn about the payment technology in use across different websites.

How to Use:

Just install the PSP Detector extension, visit any website, navigate to the checkout page, and click on the extension icon to see the payment provider in use. It’s that simple!
